sourcesContent: import { IonContent, IonPage, IonGrid, IonRow, IonRouterLink, IonToolbar, IonSearchbar, IonCol, IonList, IonLabel, IonText, IonHeader, IonTitle } from '@ionic/react'; import React from 'react'; import '../../css/Global.css'; import '../../css/Forum.css'; import TopNav from '../../components/TopNav'; import ForumRules from '../../components/Forum/ForumRules'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faClock, faCommentAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons'; import Forum_FlagModal from '../../components/Forum/Forum_FlagModal'; const ForumSearch: React.FC = () => { const search = 'Wollongong'; return ( Search Results for: {search} {/* Display all Questions */} Anyone going to enrol for the Cyber Security (University of {search}) course? ~ Martin John 21-11-2020, 5.30pm 0 ); }; export default ForumSearch;
